contextId.occurrenceNote: "one bath of wine" or "22 liters of wine" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bvolume]])
"220 liters of seed will produce only 22 liters of grain." One homer equals ten ephahs. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bvolume]])
contextId.glQuote: one homer of seed will yield only an ephah
